channel.title: Hugo on Electricidad para todos
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Electricidad para todos

item.title: Install Hugo in Windows
item.author: jorgitobaliero@gmail.com (Jorge Electricidad)
item.description: Hugo comes in three versions: Standard, Extended, and Extended/Deploy. The Standard edition covers core functionalities, while Extended adds advanced options, with Extended/Deploy** offering further deployment features.

item.title: How to use Lightbi theme ?
item.author: jorgitobaliero@gmail.com (Jorge Electricidad)
item.description: In this post, we’ll cover how to install Hugo and set up your first website with the Lightbi theme. For detailed steps, refer to Hugo’s quick-start guide.

item.title: Image Gallery Shortcode
item.author: jorgitobaliero@gmail.com (Jorge Electricidad)
item.description:
Experimental feature

This feature is currently in experimental mode, so breaking changes may occur. Please use it carefully.

item.title: Hosting Your Hugo Site on Netlify
item.author: jorgitobaliero@gmail.com (Jorge Electricidad)
item.description: Hosting a Hugo site on Netlify is an effective solution for deploying static websites, combining Hugo’s speed with Netlify’s robust features like continuous deployment, a user-friendly dashboard, and advanced build settings.

item.title: Parameters in Lightbi
item.author: jorgitobaliero@gmail.com (Jorge Electricidad)
item.description: Below is a list of configurable parameters in the Lightbi theme, along with descriptions to help you customize your site effectively. You can be adjust the below parameters in your hugo.toml file.
